sources.title: Surrogate | Full Movie 2024 | Paranormal Horror Ghost Story
sources.description:
Surrogate - A ghost horror about single mother and nurse Natalie who falls mysteriously ill and struggles to stop her family from being destroyed.
2022.  Stars: Kestie Morassi, Jane Badler, Taysha Farrugia
